name: Autopilot (crazy4videogames)
description:
Updated version of a game I made in collaboration with a friend and classmate for the GMTK game jam 2020.

Original game jam upload: https://quertx.itch.io/autopilot

Controls:

Movement - Arrow Keys/Xbox left stick or Dpad

Shoot - Z/Xbox A

Focus Mode - X/Xbox X

Exit to main menu - TAB/Xbox start

Update log from original game jam upload:

Fixed some minor bugs such as missile collision and enemies jittering when shot

Added invincibility frames after getting hit

More difficulty scaling

Controller support (doesn't work in menus at the moment, sorry :/)

Fixed some sounds and spelling/grammar errors

Sound Credit (Since we neglected to mention them in original release):

SubspaceAudio - "512 sound effects (8-bit)"

Nene - "Boss Battle #2 ['8bit']"

Any feedback good or bad, don't hesitate to say so! Thanks for reading and playing!
